Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "+apropos scans the available +man documentation, attempting to locate all pages which contain the specified keywords.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe command and the truncated beginning of the description is the displayed to the user."

"+apropos ip\\r\\n Searches for any +man pages which contain the letter sequence \\"ip\\" (note that the words \\"ip\\", \\"nip\\" and \\"ipsearch\\" all match this sequence)\\r\\n\\r\\n+apropos ip search\\r\\n Searches for any +man pages which contain the letter sequence \\"ip\\" and the letter sequence \\"search\\""
